standard_american_english: I'm not even trying to ruin her day or make her upset, this just occurred to me this morning.

standard_american_english: How the fuck do you shoot an unarmed black person? What were you scared of?

standard_american_english: People flex on Twitter, but you know I'm not about that Twitter stuff, man. Don't do it.

standard_american_english: It's not about what you said, it's the fact that you were even talking to my ex. I don't communicate with your ex nor do I engage in that. I'd rather not.

standard_american_english: A wise man once told me that when you want success as much as you want to breathe, you'll get just that.
aae_from_sae: A wise man once told me dat when you want success as much as you want to breathe, you gon' get just dat.

standard_american_english: No worries when you're doing you, whether someone doesn't like you or not.

standard_american_english: Now I have one of your girls saying they are scared (Tajhanae)
